name: Color Surprise
description:
Color Surprise is a revolutionary coloring app with stunning visuals, interactive graphics, and a groundbreaking user experience!

Color Surprise reveals illustrations layer-by-layer, reducing the clutter and complexity of regular coloring games. Each layer reveals another clue to the complete design. Anything is possible in the wonderful world of Color Surprise!

Bring your colored illustrations to life with animation! Color Surprise technology allows you to create custom image sequences to wow friends and family with your creativity! Unlock your inner child and easily produce amazing works.

Let your imagination blossom while reducing stress and anxiety. Color Surprise categories include Betty Boop, Fabulous Florals, Amazing Animals, Kawaii Cuties, and Meditative Mandalas.

Originally in black and white, now in brilliant color! Iconic Betty Boop brings inspirational Boopisms to Color Surprise. Join Betty Boop and her crew of cartoon companions on awesome adventures! *Exclusive to Color Surprise.

Live Colorfully with Color Surprise!
